bibl.title: Prosopographica.
bibl.note: Series of notes concerning high-ranking persons who flourished in Late Antique Egypt. - 1. Phoebammon, comes (and poet). - 2. Fl. Ausonius, vir clarissimus (and others). - 3. Fl. Olympius, vir spectabilis (and others). - 4. Hephaestus, dux et augustalis Alexandreae.
bibl.seg: Series of notes concerning high-ranking persons who flourished in Late Antique Egypt. - 1. Phoebammon, comes (and poet). - 2. Fl. Ausonius, vir clarissimus (and others). - 3. Fl. Olympius, vir spectabilis (and others). - 4. Hephaestus, dux et augustalis Alexandreae.
